content.raw:
I agree. Looks good to me.  

In terms of documentation, would recommend we simply add more detail to the Competition and Tasks Descriptions document to specify the value for the “W” weighting coefficient and explain that heading error is taken to be the smallest angular difference.  

I don’t think we need a forum post dedicated to this - but with the next announcement we will want to let folks know that we’ve added this detail to the documentation.

‌

I agree. Looks good to me.

In terms of documentation, would recommend we simply add more detail to the Competition and Tasks Descriptions document to specify the value for the “W” weighting coefficient and explain that heading error is taken to be the smallest angular difference.

I don’t think we need a forum post dedicated to this - but with the next announcement we will want to let folks know that we’ve added this detail to the documentation.
